application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of the following revisions to the scheme: (a) Elevations showing the areas where repair work is proposed; (b) Detailed assessment of the causes and effects of the identified masonry cracks, including whether movement is active or historic; (c) Detailed written specification of structural repairs, to include traditional masons repairs in the first instance, with proprietary metal reinforcement methods used only where demonstrated to be the minimum intervention necessary; and (d) With regard to brickwork repairs, existing bricks should be used where possible and stock bricks to match used only where necessary pursuant to pursuant to Condition 12 of planning permission dated 04 June 2019 (RN: 19/01872/FULL) (as amended by RN: 19/05426/NMA). (Linked to 22/08313/ADLBC).
